nodes.text: The Chandrilan Security Force was Chandrila's Planetary Security Force throughout its history.

The Chandrilan Security Force was active during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the resurgent Sith Empire. During the Battle of the Red Reaper, The security force successfully defended the Chandrila Orbital Station with the help of an external strike team from an invasion of radical and xenophobic, rogue arm of the Sith Empire.
The Chandrilan Security Force was still active by the time of the Galactic Civil War.
